Instruction.div: Click the link below to insert the standard text.

Text.div:
On the following pages you will be asked %System_NumberOfQuestions% questions about [QuizTitle].
You may be asked 3 different types of questions: multiple choice, true/false or yes/no. Answer each question by clicking the radio button to the left of the most appropriate response.
After you answer the last question, you will be given the chance to review and then submit your answers.
Please note that if you Exit the quiz before clicking the Submit Answers button then your answers will not be saved.
To move between questions, use the Previous and Next navigation buttons on the bottom right of the page. Do not use your browser back/forward buttons as this will cause you to Exit the quiz.

You have reached the end of the quiz.
You can now review or change your answers. Use the navigation buttons to move between questions.
When you are happy with your answers, click the Submit Answers button below. You will then see whether you passed the quiz.
